code: export var URL="http://localhost:3000";export var MINIMUM_PASSWORD_LENGTH=3;export var MINIMUM_USERNAME_LENGTH=3;export var MAXIMUM_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH=200;export var MAXIMUM_USERNAME_LENGTH=64;export var EMAIL_REGULAR=/([a-zA-Z0-9._-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)/;export var URL_REGULAR=/^(https?:\/\/)?([\da-z\.-]+)\.([a-z\.]{2,6})([\/\w \.-]*)*\/?$/;export var getBase64=function getBase64(file){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var reader=new FileReader();reader.readAsDataURL(file);reader.onload=function(){return resolve(reader.result);};reader.onerror=function(error){return reject(error);};});};export var makeRightDeclension=function makeRightDeclension(count,txt){var cases=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:[2,0,1,1,1,2];return txt[count%100>4&&count%100<20?2:cases[count%10<5?count%10:5]];};export var priceArr=[100,300,500,1000,3000];
